name: Ates ve Su Wild Hunt
description:
A local co-op,Top-Down, Dungeon crawler game. Made in GMS:2 in under 48 hours in ITU OTG  X BAU BUG Jamhood2020.

Controls:

Warrior(red): moves with wasd, dash with space, shield with l_shift.

Wizard(blue): moves with arrow keys, cast electric spear with left click, cast heal spell with right click.

Warrior's hp is 5

Wizard's hp is 3

Both of the players have 5 mana/stamina as shown in the upper corners of the screen.

Zombies and skeletons have 2 hp, crabs have only 1 hp.

Coder: Bahtiyar Can ARGÜZ

Pixel Animator: Deniz ERYILMAZ

Pixel Artist: Yusuf Ömer ÇAKIR
